title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 897.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 897.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

In addition to the requirements of Part 17 of this Title, except section
17.2, and provided that at least
an original of such petition will be filed with the secretary, applications
under sections
221
or
222
of the

Public Service Law shall conform to the requirements of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
897.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
